chartData.name: Fact 1
chartData.description: Here are 5 interesting facts with stats about laughter:

chartData.name: Fact 2
chartData.description: 1. On average, a child laughs 300 times a day while an adult laughs only 17 times a day[1].

chartData.name: Fact 3
chartData.description: 2. Just 10 to 15 minutes of laughing a day can burn up to 40 calories, according to a Vanderbilt University study[3].

chartData.name: Fact 4
chartData.description: 3. A typical 10-minute conversation has an average of 5.8 bouts of laughter[5].

chartData.name: Fact 5
chartData.description: 4. Laughter is contagious. Research has shown that you're 30 times more likely to laugh when someone else is around than when you're by yourself[5].

chartData.name: Fact 6
chartData.description: 5. Laughter has physiological effects on the body. It increases heart and respiratory rates as well as oxygen consumption over a short period. After these initial changes, a person moves into a state of relaxation[7].
